timeline.bodyText: The PowerMock docs put the entries in double quotes: https://github.com/powermock/powermock/wiki/PowerMock-Configuration
timeline.author: tillrohrmann
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+powermock.global-ignore=javax.management.*,com.sun.jndi.*,org.apache.log4j.*,org.apache.logging.log4j.*
